parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Event Handlers </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes Eden Editor event handler of given type and ID.
<br><br>
See the list of all [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers:_Eden_Editor|Eden Editor Event Handlers]].
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''remove3DENEventHandler''' [type,id]</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> type: [[String]] - name of event handler </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> id: [[Number]] - ID of event handler, returned by [[add3DENEventHandler]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>eh = [[add3DENEventHandler]] ["onUndo",{[[systemChat]] "Zip..."}];
[[remove3DENEventHandler]] ["onUndo",eh];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  
[[add3DENEventHandler]]
[[removeAll3DENEventHandlers]]
</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
